Class FileReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • FileReader

  • public class FileReader
extends java.lang.Object
    FileReader reads from the file and constructs the cell with Scanner as the parameter. Version History - version 1.0, version 1.1, version 1.2, 1.3, version 1.4 Filename: FileReader.java
    Version:
    1.4 copyright: No Copyright Purpose
    Author:
    Marcin Kapcia, Chester Descallar, Ben Parker, Hossein, Sean Coaker

      • readLevel

        public static java.lang.Object[][] readLevel(java.lang.String fileName)
        Method to read a level file and returns a 2d array of objects from this file. The program should handle the file with a not found exception and shut down the program gracefully.
        Parameters:
        fileName - - the name of the file
        Returns:
        The array of the cell from the file

      • readSave

        public static java.lang.Object[][] readSave(java.lang.String fileName)
        Reads a save file and pulls out all the data from it
        Parameters:
        fileName - - the name of the save file
        Returns:
        - the map read off the save file

      • getFileName

        public static java.lang.String getFileName(int levelNo)
        Gets the name of the file from its level number.
        Parameters:
        levelNo - - the levels number, which will always be over 100
        Returns:
        the string name of the file, or null if none match

        Returns:
